name: RUN! (itch) (RandomGames7)
description:
My second 3D horror game where you guys  play as someone who needs to fix his car but there is  something lurking in the woods.

It haves simple controls.

WASD to move

E to Interact

Shift to Run

Space to jump

This is my second 3D game so leave any ideas or feedback on the comments c:

Update: Fixed some bugs and improved some things
